answers.answer: This is a condition which should have meant an immediate trip to the emergency room.It is pointless to speculate on an internet board about the possible causes. Obviously low blood pressure could have been a factor.The condition could have resulted from a vasovagal episode or developing heart failure.In any event, death is forever. You smell and they throw away your stuff. Plus, the songs at the funeral service are awful.I urge you to get him an in-person medical evaluation as soon as possible.
